ygData.subject: RE: RE: RE: Bellow song Damage
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ya bards can not solo a blue, but they can duo a blue .  Just charm one to kill the other.  Make sure you charm the winner.  Then finish off the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>A bard soloing a blue at 35th! LOL!
>
>At 32nd with maxed 1HB and maxed 1HS, a Staff of Writhing and a Silvery War
>Axe I can kill a light blue if nothing abnormal happens and he's not a
>caster. Taking on a blue or deep blue would be tantamount to suicide, at
>best very, very risky. For me a solid blue mob would be a Lizard Fanatic
>in
>Cazic-Thule. It would pound me into the mud one-on-one. No question. On
>the other hand, a light blue would be a gator in the sewers. I *can* solo
>one of those.
>
>So you know how I chose to kill a Fan? I group and play Hymn, Anthem,
>Binding, Clarity, Pixie Strike, Lullaby, etc. People like to have me in a
>group because of all the "miscellaneous" stuff that I/we do. No
>enchanter? - Pixie Strike that Herald while the meleers in the group kill
>the Page.
>
>To kill a solid blue mob a 35th bard would have to do a bit more than "kite
>a little" to be comfortable. They'd have to GROUP.
>
>Crier Sharpsong

Ya bards can not solo a blue, but they can duo a blue <grin>. Just charm
one to kill the other. Make sure you charm the winner. Then finish off the
nearly dead ex-pet.


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
